address1: Office No.2604, The Exchange Tower, Business Bay

partnerDetails.about:
Technorb Systems is a multi-disciplinary organization offering Turnkey Solutions for technology in building automation, Information Technology, Security Projects through its office and with strategic partnerships with various technology partners in the Middle East and India. Technorb System works closely with clients to design commission and maintain state-of-the-art technology projects, designed to support and deliver as per client's exacting requirements.

Technorb Systems, has been recognized as the leading solutions provider in the field of Building Automation, IT, Security System Solutions, Safety System, Audio Video (AV), UPS and BMS. Its wide fleet of product range & services such as Lighting Control, Hotel Guest Room Management, Home Automation, AV Systems, CCTV Systems, Access Controls, Addressable Fire Alarm System, PA & BGM system products & solutions, Security Turnstiles, Boom Barriers to name a few has placed the company on the dynamic & progressive path to meet the growing needs of Security & Safety industry.
